Gothic Manor Goblet
kDesc
Wield this dragon shaped goblet as you prepare a toast for your party. [#Legal]
Brandissez ce verre à pied en forme de dragon et portez un toast en l'honneur de vos invités. [#Legal]
Schwinge diesen Drachenkelch, wenn du zu einem Toast ansetzt. [#Legal]
Alza questo calice a forma di drago per proporre un brindisi alla tua festa. [#Legal]
Utiliza esta copa en forma de dragón para proponer un brindis a tus invitados. [#Legal]
龍を象ったゴブレットで楽しいパーティーの祝杯を！ [#Legal]
용의 모양을 본뜬 예식용 잔으로 파티의 시작을 알리는 건배를 제안하십시오. [#Legal]
Wield this dragon shaped goblet as you prepare a toast for your party. [#Legal]
揮動這個巨龍形狀的酒杯，準備在派對裡乾杯。 [#Legal]
揮動這個巨龍形狀的酒杯，準備在派對裡乾杯。 [#Legal]
Wield this dragon shaped goblet as you prepare a toast for your party. [#Legal]
